name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: A lot of what the barangays do is delegated City-government -work.     I know they handle security on the local level such as Barangay Tanods, CCTV (yeah, mine put this up). I'm sure they have a say on local transport such as the tricycle routes, and are part of the discussion when greater commute routes intersect their part of town - jeeps, fxes are the most common. They also handle the flow of traffic (which admittedly only involves the blocking of roads) during barangay-wide festivals.
